duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the planning and development of strategic plans, roadmaps, and objectives for advanced technologies and programs.
Manage operational budgets for technology projects and contracts.
Lead cross functional teams to achieve technology initiatives.
Manage contracts with vendors and conduct market research to identify technology trends.
Produce metrics to measure systems, projects, vendors, and service provider performance.
Facilitate periodic executive round table and steering committees on related technologies and programs.
Facilitate internal communication, education, and training to staff, and internal and external stakeholders.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Public Administration, Engineering, Information Sciences, or related fields (Master's preferred)
